body.name: Bedsure Cotton Comforter Set Queen Size - Dark Grey 100% Washed Cotton Comforter, Soft Bedding for All Seasons, 3 Pieces, 1 Comforter (90"x90") and 2 Pillow Cases (20"x26")
features: Extra Cozy: The 100% cotton outer cover on this comforter set provides exceptional breathability and moisture-wicking properties, ensuring maximum coziness night after night.

Ultra Soft: This comforter is prewashed in manufacturing, and filled with extra-fine polyester microfiber to achieve an exquisite softness that's gentle on the skin, delivering all-year-round comfort.
Natural Wrinkle: This comforter features a stylish, natural wrinkle that can effortlessly complement any interior space.
Safe Material: This fluffy comforter is Standard 100 by OEKO-TEX certified for meeting the highest testing criteria for harmful chemicals and has been found harmless for humans.
Easy Care: The Bedsure comforter set is machine-washable and easy to maintain. Simply machine wash in cold water on gentle cycles and tumble dry low for a like-new restoration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was needing!
reviews.reviewText: Dark gray is a pretty color. Size is perfect. The king size hangs down to my side rails on each side of the bed. Hangs down past the footboard. Plenty big enough to cover my king size bed. The cotton is soft and comfortable to sleep against. The filing did seem to fluff up a bit in the dryer and make it even more snuggly. We immediately bought two more in the same size and color! We are letting our new puppy sleep with us, and I’m washing bedding every 2 days! Love my puppy, don’t love the hair she leaves behind!Overall it’s a solid comforter. Well worth the cost. It washes beautifully and dries beautifully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE this comforter
reviews.reviewText: If I could give this product more stars I would. This is by far the comfiest comforter I have ever owned. It’s lightweight and breathable but also somehow really warm on cold nights!!! 100% cotton so it’s soft and easy to wash and gentle on sensitive skin! I seriously couldn’t love this set more. Do yourself a favor and buy it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are really 100% cotton!
reviews.reviewText: Quality sheets, Beautiful color,100 % cotton, Comfortable, We purchased them for upcoming trip to our son's house. Had them shipped to his house because he didn't have any sheets for a guest bed. Plus i'm picky I like a 100% cotton sheets and comforter. To send a twenty four year old out to try to find that. I would end up with who knows what? He did wash them before we arrived. He didn't use any fabric softener. Also some cheap off brand washing detergent. So they were a little stiff, but you could tell it was because they were new. I'm sure after a few more washes they will be absolutely perfect texture. Very well made. I was not hot. Beautiful color. I loved everything about these sheets and i'm very Particular about my bedding. I'm giving it a five star. If you're looking for true one hundred percent cotton sheets here they are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Thick and cozy in the cold but nice and breathable material. Definitely great comforter especially for the $$

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s comfy but wrinkly
reviews.reviewText: I have a queen size bed and bought a king. The comforter does indeed seem a little smaller than a normal king. Like other reviews, I can confirm it is wrinkly which is not my personal preference but it’s light weight and SUPER cozy so I decided to put it under my other set. I have it layered up and my bed feels so comfy now! For the price it’s a great set if you don’t mind the wrinkles. I just purchased one for my daughter too. She laid down in my bed and set it felt so comfortable and wanted one. I hope they make this in white soon so I can purchase another for my son’s room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It feels really soft and feels nice, but it’s more of a gray color than green. Kinda small. Covers the top of the bed only and doesn’t hang over the top any.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like the color and extremely comfortable. Fits our queen bed fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fluffy and comfy!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my kids bedrooms but let me tell you the quality and fluffiness of these things is out of this world!
